text: Ângelo Gaspar Martins (19 April 1930 – 11 October 2020), simply known as Ângelo, was a Portuguese footballer. He played as a defender for Benfica and the Portugal national team.Benfica de luto pelo bicampeão europeu Ângelo Martins His career lasted from 1945 to 1962. He was born in Porto, Portugal. Martins died on 11 October 2020, at the age of 90. ==Honours== ===Player=== Benfica *Primeira Liga: 1954–55, 1956–57, 1959–60, 1960–61, 1962–63, 1963–64, 1964–65 *Taça de Portugal: 1952–53, 1954–55, 1956–57, 1961–62, 1963–64 *Taça de Honra: 1962–63 *European Cup: 1960–61, 1961–62 *Intercontinental Cup runner-up: 1961, 1962 ===Manager=== Benfica * Campeonato Nacional de Juniores (7) * Campeonato Nacional de Juvenis (6) * Campeonato Nacional de Iniciados (2) ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Portuguese footballers
title: Ângelo Martins
